subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: When the Australian driver Mark Webber, now 36, leaves at the end of the season after 12 years in Formula One, he'll be remembered as much for his sportsmanship as for his racing accomplishments.
snippet: When the Australian driver Mark Webber, now 36, leaves at the end of the season after 12 years in Formula One, he'll be remembered as much for his sportsmanship as for his racing accomplishments.
